go_data.justification: Lck is described as a tyrosine kinase that is activated upon TCR engagement.
Lck is activated in response to TCR ligation, indicating its involvement in the T cell receptor signaling pathway.

go_data.term: regulation of Rho protein signal transduction
go_data.justification: Lck regulates Vav activation of members of the Rho family of GTPases.
